      • tagStringToIntArray

        public static int[] tagStringToIntArray(String tags,
                                        String dictionaryName)
                                 throws ConfigurationException
        Converts a comma separated string of tags to ints. The tags can be either integer values or well known tag names. e.g. "34, MsgType, 82, Currency" gives the array [34, 35, 82, 15]
        Parameters:
        tags - string containing comma or space separated list of tags.
        dictionaryName - The dictionary to use when interpreting named tags.
        Returns:
        converted tags
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
